cleaned_text: Free UK Shipping Over £25. 100% Natural always! The Yougi Aromatherapy Bath Bomb Kit contains everything you'll need to make 100% natural Bath Bombs at home. Detox Bath Bomb Kit with Essential Oils All raw materials are cruelty-free, ethically sourced, eco-friendly, and 100% natural. Inspired by bathing rituals thought to cleanse both body and mind and allow for complete relaxation. During this feel-good creative class, you will learn - The basics of fragrance creation - How to make a bath bomb - Measurements and technical details - The therapeutic benefits of essential oils The kit contains all the natural ingredients you will need. It includes: Sodium Bicarbonate, Citric Acid, Epsom Salt, Sweet Almond Oil, 10ml Detox Essential Oil, Dried Lavander, and Rose Clay. Two Bath Bomb Mould (ingredients make two bath bombs) The bath bomb kit comes in the four scents below. Click here to see the full range. - Detox blend - rosemary, peppermint, lemongrass, bergamot - Soothe blend -lavender, eucalyptus, geranium - Happy blend-bergamot, orange, ylang-ylang, lemongrass - New Romantic blend- rose geranium, palmarosa, sandalwood
